details.publicNotes: These hideously black, green, and rust-red flat-headed globs of bone, flesh, and matted hair are seen in the most industrious sectors of the “civilized” world. They make their homes in chimneys and smokestacks, reaching out to catch meals with their growing distended arms. Their powerful grasps and chosen homes gives credence to their disturbing name-sake, and although they prefer larger factories, they can make their homes in the cramped and downtrodden packed homes of the slums where they can make a terrible pest.

description.value: The chimneychoke can squeeze in spaces up to two sizes smaller than its own size.

Trigger The chimneychoke moves or is hit by an attack

Effect After the attack or movement, soot is kicked up into the air. Creatures adjacent to the chimneychoke at the end of its movement or after it is hit whose primary vision is based on sight or smell must make a @Check[fortitude|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Frequency Once per round

Requirement The chimneychoke has an adjacent creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}

Effect Its malformed body writhes and lays claw and fang on its captured target. The chimneychoke makes a bite and claw Strike on the grabbed or restrained creature.

Requirement The chimneychoke has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, and it has maintained the condition on the creature since its last turn

Effect The chimneychoke maintains the grab during its turn, and the target creature also becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} and is unable to speak without coughing for 1 round. This prevents the target from using most auditory effects involving its voice, and it must succeed at a @Check[flat|dc:5] to Cast a Spell with a verbal component or the spell is disrupted.
